roleset.name: changes from one form into another form

example.text: This review examines the use of new and emerging DNA, tissue, and live-cell transfection microarray technologies that can be used to discover, validate, and translate information resulting from the completion of the Human Genome Project.
example.arg: the use of new and emerging DNA, tissue, and live-cell transfection microarray technologies
information resulting from the completion of the Human Genome Project

example.text: Malaria is an attractive model for the development and validation of approaches to translate genomic information to vaccine development because of the critical need for effective anti-malarial interventions and because the Plasmodium parasite is a complex multistage pathogen targeted by multiple immune responses.

example.text: Thus, Acj6 and Drifter translate PN lineage information into distinct dendritic targeting specificity.

example.text: Cells use signalling networks to translate with high fidelity extracellular signals into specific cellular functions.
